tools.name: list_folders
tools.description:
List all available mail folders in Outlook
    
    Returns:
        A list of available mail folders

tools.name: list_recent_emails
tools.description:
List email titles from the specified number of days
    
    Args:
        days: Number of days to look back for emails (max 30)
        folder_name: Name of the folder to check (if not specified, checks the Inbox)
        
    Returns:
        Numbered list of email titles with sender information

tools.name: search_emails
tools.description:
Search emails by contact name or keyword within a time period
    
    Args:
        search_term: Name or keyword to search for
        days: Number of days to look back (max 30)
        folder_name: Name of the folder to search (if not specified, searches the Inbox)
        
    Returns:
        Numbered list of matching email titles

tools.name: get_email_by_number
tools.description:
Get detailed content of a specific email by its number from the last listing
    
    Args:
        email_number: The number of the email from the list results
        
    Returns:
        Full details of the specified email

tools.name: reply_to_email_by_number
tools.description:
Reply to a specific email by its number from the last listing
    
    Args:
        email_number: The number of the email from the list results
        reply_text: The text content for the reply
        
    Returns:
        Status message indicating success or failure

tools.name: compose_email
tools.description:
Compose and send a new email
    
    Args:
        recipient_email: Email address of the recipient
        subject: Subject line of the email
        body: Main content of the email
        cc_email: Email address for CC (optional)
        
    Returns:
        Status message indicating success or failure

Body:
Microsoft 帐户	
非常感谢你验证安全信息	
你最近验证了 Microsoft 帐户 ou**t@outlook.com <mailto:ou**t@outlook.com>  上的安全信息。这是定期安全检查，仅在你最近没有使用安全代码的情况下进行。你无需在每次登录时都提供一个代码。	
保持帐户相关安全信息的正确和最新十分重要。我们不会使用该信息向你发送垃圾邮件或将其用于任何销售目的。它仅用于在帐户出现问题时验证你的身份。	
要了解详细信息或联系支持人员，请单击此处 <http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=281822> 。	
若要在收到安全通知的位置选择退出或进行更改，请单击此处 <https://account.live.com/SecurityNotifications/Update> 。	
谢谢!	
Microsoft 帐户团队	
隐私声明 <https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=521839> 
Microsoft Corporation, One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052

response.result: Email sent successfully to: a_very_long_email_address_that_exceeds_normal_length_limits@example.com

compose_email.case_name: Compose Email with Special Characters in Subject
compose_email.purpose: 验证主题行中包含特殊字符时是否能正常工作（边界条件测试）

args.subject: Test!@#$%^&*()_+-={}[]|\:;"'<>,.?/~`
args.body: This is a test email with special characters in the subject line.

response.result: Email sent successfully to: test@example.com

compose_email.case_name: Compose Email with SQL Injection Attempt
compose_email.purpose: 验证工具是否能安全处理包含潜在SQL注入尝试的邮件内容（安全性测试）

args.subject: SQL Injection Test
args.body: DROP TABLE emails; -- This is a test email body.

response.result: Email sent successfully to: test@example.com

compose_email.purpose: 验证工具是否能安全处理包含潜在XSS攻击尝试的邮件内容（安全性测试）

args.subject: XSS Test
args.body: <script>alert('xss')</script> This is a test email body.

compose_email.case_name: Compose Email When Network is Disconnected
compose_email.purpose: 验证网络中断情况下工具是否能优雅地处理错误（错误处理测试）

args.subject: Network Failure Test
args.body: This email should fail gracefully when network is disconnected.
